row.col: Please this article or section. Help improve this article by adding . (May 2008)''

bdy.p:
Prof. Sukhadeo Thorat (Maharasthra) (born ) is an
India n economist and chairman of the University Grants Commission.

sec.p:
Sukhadeo Thorat was born in village Mahimapur,
Amravati district
,
Maharashtra , India. He did B.A from Milind College of Arts, Aurangabad (Maharashtra), M.A. in Economics from
Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar Marathwada University , M.Phil/Ph.D in Economics from
Jawaharlal Nehru University , and Diploma in Economic Planning, Main School of Planning Warsaw, Poland. The
University of Kalyani and
Avinashilingam University honoured him by conferring D.Litt on 26.04.2007 and 01.09.2007 respectively1.

From February 1989 to 1991, Prof Thorat was visiting faculty at
Iowa State University , USA and Consultant with International Food Policy Research Institute, Washington DC. During all these years of his teaching and research, he has some 13 books and more than 70 Research papers published in esteemed national and International journals. He has worked on more than 25 Research Projects. He has presented around 50 papers in several national and international seminars and conferences. Prof. Thorat has been visited USA, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Germany, Netherlands, UK, Italy, China, Iran, Nepal, Finland, South Africa, Japan, Ethiopia, Thailand, Philippines, France & Northern Ireland so far.

Prof Thorat has been Member of several bodies like CAPART, Social justice Division of Planning Commission, Academic Council of Dr Babasaheb Ambedkar Central University, Centre of Buddhist Studies,
Himachal Pradesh University and in the governing bodies of many more Institutions.

Padma Shri (2008)
Dr Ambedkar Chetna Award by Manwatawadi Rachana Manch Jallunder,
Punjab

list.entry: Chairman, UGC since February, 2006.
Faculty Member, Jawaharlal Nehru University, New Delhi w.e.f. 1980 onwards.
Visiting Faculty at Department of Economics, Iowa State University, AMES, USA during 1989-1991.
Director, Indian Institute of Dalit Studies, New Delhi w.e.f. January, 2003 to February, 2006.
Lecturer, Vasantrao Naik College, Aurangabad during 1973-80.
Research Associate of International Food Policy Research Institute, Washington DC, U.S.A. since 1992.
